entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of ice pellets in the morning then to periods of rain later in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
